Image Converter
-------------------

This pixelates a .jpg image using Pillow and creates new BOX children with the Properties of the pixels from the image.

.. literalinclude:: 4-image-converter.py
    :language: python

**Demo Files:**

- `JPG input <https://github.com/AlbertoV5/tosclib/blob/main/demos/files/logo.jpg>`_
- `Input .tosc <https://github.com/AlbertoV5/tosclib/blob/main/demos/files/test.tosc>`_
- `Output .tosc <https://github.com/AlbertoV5/tosclib/blob/main/demos/files/out.tosc>`_
